block.p: Aeneid Mignon Espy and Timothy Joseph Edwards were married yesterday by the Rev. Gail Williford at St. Paul's United Methodist Church in Houston.
Ms. Espy-Edwards, 38, is the senior vice president for marketing and strategic planning at the Warner Music Group in New York. She graduated from Spelman College.
Aeneid Mignon Espy and Timothy Joseph Edwards were married yesterday by the Rev. Gail Williford at St. Paulâ€™s United Methodist Church in Houston.
Aeneid Mignon Espy and Timothy Joseph Edwards were married yesterday by the Rev. Gail Williford at St. Paul's United Methodist Church in Houston.
Ms. Espy-Edwards, 38, is the senior vice president for marketing and strategic planning at the Warner Music Group in New York. She graduated from Spelman College.

She is the daughter of Bobbie Espy of Houston and Tom Espy of Jackson, Miss. Her father is the owner of Strategic Systems, a marketing, management and political consultancy in Jackson. Her mother teaches world history at Bellaire High School in Bellaire, Tex.
The bridegroom, 29, is an assistant vice president for commercial real estate finance at JP Morgan Chase in New York. He graduated from Howard University.

He is a son of Jennifer Edwards of Chicago and Michael Edwards of South Holland, Ill. His mother retired as the assistant principal of Crispus Attucks Academy in Chicago. His father, also retired, was a deputy chief financial officer of the Chicago Board of Education.
